column1: purplebuddhaproject 159882766240 "2017-04-23 01:47:55 GMT" http://purplebuddhaproject.tumblr.com/post/159882766240/rainfall "rainbowtwo:  ‘The Buddha compares his teaching to the rainfall that descends without discrimination on the earth. That this rain causes some seeds to grow into flowers and some into great trees implies no difference in the rain but rather is due to the capacities of the seeds that it nurtures. Thus
column2: the teaching of the Buddha is of a single flavor but benefits beings in a variety of ways according to their capacity.’ - Donald S. Lopez
column3: Jr.
column4: Buddhism in Practice. " False text

column1: purplebuddhaproject 159854723250 "2017-04-22 07:15:13 GMT" http://purplebuddhaproject.tumblr.com/post/159854723250/purplebuddhaproject-i-think-we-are-blind-blind "purplebuddhaproject: I think we are blind. Blind people who can see
column2: but do not see." False text

column1: purplebuddhaproject 159839534150 "2017-04-21 21:51:21 GMT" http://purplebuddhaproject.tumblr.com/post/159839534150/purplebuddhaproject-life-has-no-meaning-each "purplebuddhaproject: Life has no meaning. Each of us has meaning and we bring it to life. It is a waste to be asking the question when you are the answer." False text

purplebuddhaproject 159736030725 "2017-04-19 01:14:12 GMT" http://purplebuddhaproject.tumblr.com/post/159736030725/purplebuddhaproject-books-are-the-plane-and "purplebuddhaproject: “Books are the plane
column2: and the train
column3: and the road. They are the destination
column4: and the journey. They are home.” ― Anna Quindlen" False text

column1: purplebuddhaproject 159597917725 "2017-04-15 11:02:07 GMT" http://purplebuddhaproject.tumblr.com/post/159597917725/purplebuddhaproject-exiting-from-any-long-term "purplebuddhaproject: “Exiting from any long-term relationship comes at great personal expense
column2: which explains why so many people are understandably reluctant to endure the cost of severance. Beginnings and endings are always dramatic and occasionally traumatic. Youthful brio allows us to engage in transformation. As we age
column3: we carefully weigh the spectacle of continuing enduring harrowing situations or seeking melodramatic renovation of our core being. Analysis of the respective cost benefit ratio
column4: consideration of the known versus the unknown
column5: can delay or permanently deter us from altering our environment
column6: leading our persona to become more rigid as we mature. Transformations in life are disconcerting to people who resist change.” ― Kilroy J. Oldster" False text

column1: purplebuddhaproject 159422365435 "2017-04-10 18:45:37 GMT" http://purplebuddhaproject.tumblr.com/post/159422365435/the-5-ws-of-life "onlinecounsellingcollege:  1. Who you are is what makes you special. Don’t compromise your identity for others. 2. What the future holds will remain a secret. Don’t hold back from living a full life. 3. When life knocks you down
column2: get back up and fight again. 4. When you’re faced with a decision
column3: make the one you won’t regret. 5. Why stuff happens is a mystery. Don’t seek explanations – just choose to embrace life. " False text

column1: purplebuddhaproject 159399065295 "2017-04-10 02:51:43 GMT" http://purplebuddhaproject.tumblr.com/post/159399065295/purplebuddhaproject-the-pendulum-of-the-mind "purplebuddhaproject: “The pendulum of the mind oscillates between sense and nonsense
column2: not between right and wrong.”- Carl Jung" False text

column1: purplebuddhaproject 159356062000 "2017-04-09 00:45:25 GMT" http://purplebuddhaproject.tumblr.com/post/159356062000/purplebuddhaproject-self-care-is-not-selfish "purplebuddhaproject: “Self-care is not selfish. You cannot serve from an empty vessel.” ― Eleanor Brownn " False text

purplebuddhaproject 159185409725 "2017-04-04 10:30:53 GMT" http://purplebuddhaproject.tumblr.com/post/159185409725/purplebuddhaproject-please-travel-the-world "purplebuddhaproject: Please travel the world. Soak up the different culture and eat strange foods. Swim in the clear ocean and suntan on a warm rock. Take hundreds of pictures that do not do the trip justice. Go on long runs just to see the view from a different angle. Meet new faces and shake their hands; speak to them in their language even if you are not quite sure what you are saying. Go to dancing halls in Jamaica
column2: jump off cliffs in Greece
column3: climb mountains in Chile. The world is mine
column4: the world is yours
column5: the world is ours. Please travel the world." False text

column1: purplebuddhaproject 159145395850 "2017-04-03 08:43:38 GMT" http://purplebuddhaproject.tumblr.com/post/159145395850/purplebuddhaproject-i-want-to-grow-i-want-to "purplebuddhaproject: “I want to grow. column2: for forty-five days
column3: for three months. See what happens to your life. — Yoko Ono" False text

purplebuddhaproject 159110687540 "2017-04-02 13:19:53 GMT" http://purplebuddhaproject.tumblr.com/post/159110687540/purplebuddhaproject-in-fact-if-youre "purplebuddhaproject: “In fact
column2: if you’re wondering if I expect miracles—the answer is yes. Even when they don’t seem to happen
column3: I keep believing in them. Even when I stop believing in them
column4: I’ll always start again. Because if you don’t have hope
column5: what’s left? I believe. And maybe they’ll happen in a way I never saw coming–they usually do. Or maybe I’ll find the way to make them happen myself. But ether way–I expect miracles.” ― Jennifer DeLucy" False text

column1: purplebuddhaproject 159108648820 "2017-04-02 11:43:40 GMT" http://purplebuddhaproject.tumblr.com/post/159108648820/purplebuddhaproject-painting-is-the-silence-of "purplebuddhaproject: “Painting is the silence of thought and the music of sight.” ― Orhan Pamuk
column2: My Name is Red" False text

column1: purplebuddhaproject 159108192740 "2017-04-02 11:19:42 GMT" http://purplebuddhaproject.tumblr.com/post/159108192740/purplebuddhaproject-in-fact-no-one-recognizes "purplebuddhaproject: “In fact no one recognizes the happiest moment of their lives as they are living it. It may well be that
column2: in a moment of joy
column3: one might sincerely believe that they are living that golden instant “now
column4: ” even having lived such a moment before
column6: in one part of their hearts they still believe in the certainty of a happier moment to come. Because how could anyone
column7: and particularly anyone who is still young
column8: carry on with the belief that everything could only get worse: If a person is happy enough to think he has reached the happiest moment of his life
column9: he will be hopeful enough to believe his future will be just as beautiful
column11: The Museum of Innocence" False text

column1: purplebuddhaproject 159107331570 "2017-04-02 10:31:39 GMT" http://purplebuddhaproject.tumblr.com/post/159107331570/purplebuddhaproject-if-pain-must-come-may-it "purplebuddhaproject: “If pain must come
column2: may it come quickly. Because I have a life to live
column3: and I need to live it in the best way possible. If he has to make a choice
column4: may he make it now. Then I will either wait for him or forget him.” ― Paulo Coelho" False text

column4: but it’s important to remember MANY children in the world are not as fortunate as we have been. Life is what you make it- so make it beautiful for child today. Reblog this post!
